entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers late this morning and this afternoon. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and wet flurries changing to a few flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
